---
title: "Aggregates in R"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r message = FALSE}
# load packages
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r message = FALSE}
# load orders data
orders <- read_csv("orders.csv")

# inspect orders
head(orders)
```

```{r}
# define most_pop_orders here:
most_pop_orders <- orders %>%
  group_by(shoe_type) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  filter(count > 16)

most_pop_orders



```
